newsitem.title: USA: Tosco Corp may issue $600 mln in debt.
newsitem.headline: Tosco Corp may issue $600 mln in debt.

text.p: Tosco Corp is expected to tap the market next week with a $600 million three-part debt offering via Morgan Stanley & Co, corporate syndicate sources said.
The Tosco deal is expected to consist of $200 million in 10-year debt, $300 million in 30-year debt and a $100 million 50-year debt issue, sources added.
The debt offering is expected to come mid-week, sources said.
